# ui-flex

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                                                                   | Type                                                                                                                                                                                  | Default           |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| `alignItems` | `align-items` | The alignment of all items in the flex container.                                                                                                             | `"center" \| "end" \| "start" \| "stretch" \| { xs?: FlexAlignItems; sm?: FlexAlignItems; md?: FlexAlignItems; lg?: FlexAlignItems; xl?: FlexAlignItems; }`                           | `'start'`         |
| `direction`  | `direction`   | The direction all items in the flex container are distributed.                                                                                                | `"bottom-to-top" \| "left-to-right" \| "right-to-left" \| "top-to-bottom" \| { xs?: FlexDirection; sm?: FlexDirection; md?: FlexDirection; lg?: FlexDirection; xl?: FlexDirection; }` | `'left-to-right'` |
| `gap`        | `gap`         | Defines the width and height the gap between items in the flex container.                                                                                     | `string \| { xs?: string; sm?: string; md?: string; lg?: string; xl?: string; }`                                                                                                      | `'0'`             |
| `inline`     | `inline`      | Whether or not the container should take all the available space or not. - false takes all the available space - true takes only as much space as is required | `boolean \| { xs?: boolean; sm?: boolean; md?: boolean; lg?: boolean; xl?: boolean; }`                                                                                                | `false`           |
| `wrap`       | `wrap`        | Whether or not the container should wrap it's items to the next line when not enough space is available.                                                      | `boolean \| { xs?: boolean; sm?: boolean; md?: boolean; lg?: boolean; xl?: boolean; }`                                                                                                | `false`           |
